long_description: The REI Cambria Flap daypack is a compact daypack with a slim profile. It's structured to carry minimal daily necessities, including your tablet, with comfort and ease. Main pocket opening is covered by a quick-close magnetic flap; pocket also zips shut when extra security is desired. Padded protective back pocket fits an iPad or e-reader; exterior zipper access is quick and secure. Interior features organization for pens and cards, and a fleece-lined pocket for protection of phone or small accessories. REI Cambria Flap daypack is made from partially recycled post-consumer fabric which holds up well against urban elements.
short_description: The REI Cambria Flap daypack is a compact daypack with a slim profile. It's structured to carry minimal daily necessities, including your tablet, with comfort and ease.
